Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is going to score big time with martial arts aficionados has just as many martial arts sequences as it does one liners and there are lots of both. The story is just thin enough to flesh out some hilarious scenes featuring a posse of ninjas who break into a Pentagon storage facility,
